mapper.insert: insert into WEDDING_BEHAVIOR( TYPE, APPUSERID, RELATIONID, BEHAVIOR_ID, CREATETIME ) values ( #{TYPE}, #{APPUSERID}, #{RELATIONID}, #{BEHAVIOR_ID}, #{CREATETIME} )
mapper.update: update WEDDING_BEHAVIOR set TYPE = #{TYPE}, APPUSERID = #{APPUSERID}, RELATIONID = #{RELATIONID}, BEHAVIOR_ID = BEHAVIOR_ID where BEHAVIOR_ID = #{BEHAVIOR_ID}
mapper.select: select TYPE, APPUSERID, RELATIONID, BEHAVIOR_ID from WEDDING_BEHAVIOR where BEHAVIOR_ID = #{BEHAVIOR_ID}
select a.TYPE, a.APPUSERID, a.RELATIONID, a.BEHAVIOR_ID from WEDDING_BEHAVIOR a

select a.TYPE, a.APPUSERID, a.RELATIONID, a.BEHAVIOR_ID, b.NAME, b.AREA, b.STAR, b.STANDARDMEALFROM, b.STANDARDMEALTO, b.HASPARKINGLOT, b.SALESMAN, b.SALESPHONE, b.SALESTEL, b.BANQUETHALLNAME, b.TABLENUMBER, b.REMARKS, b.ADDRESS, b.HOTEL_ID, u.USERNAME, u.PHONE from WEDDING_BEHAVIOR a LEFT JOIN WEDDING_HOTEL b ON a.RELATIONID = b.HOTEL_ID LEFT JOIN SYS_APP_USER u ON a.APPUSERID = u.USER_ID WHERE a.type = 'BROWSE_HOTEL'

select a.TYPE, a.APPUSERID, a.RELATIONID, a.BEHAVIOR_ID, b.THEME, b.INTRODUCTION, b.ZAMBIANUMBER, b.SERVICEITEMS, b.PRICE, b.DETAIL, b.SERVICE_ID u.USERNAME, u.PHONE from WEDDING_BEHAVIOR a LEFT JOIN WEDDING_SERVICE b ON a.RELATIONID = b.SERVICE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS_APP_USER u ON a.APPUSERID = u.USER_ID WHERE a.type = 'BROWSE_PACKAGE'

select a.TYPE, a.APPUSERID, a.RELATIONID, a.BEHAVIOR_ID, b.NAME, b.AREA, b.STAR, b.STANDARDMEALFROM, b.STANDARDMEALTO, b.HASPARKINGLOT, b.SALESMAN, b.SALESPHONE, b.SALESTEL, b.BANQUETHALLNAME, b.TABLENUMBER, b.REMARKS, b.ADDRESS, b.HOTEL_ID, u.USERNAME, u.PHONE from WEDDING_BEHAVIOR a LEFT JOIN WEDDING_HOTEL b ON a.RELATIONID = b.HOTEL_ID LEFT JOIN SYS_APP_USER u ON a.APPUSERID = u.USER_ID WHERE a.type = 'HOTEL_COLLECTION'

select a.TYPE, a.APPUSERID, a.RELATIONID, a.BEHAVIOR_ID, b.THEME, b.INTRODUCTION, b.ZAMBIANUMBER, b.SERVICEITEMS, b.PRICE, b.DETAIL, b.SERVICE_ID u.USERNAME, u.PHONE from WEDDING_BEHAVIOR a LEFT JOIN WEDDING_SERVICE b ON a.RELATIONID = b.SERVICE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS_APP_USER u ON a.APPUSERID = u.USER_ID WHERE a.type = 'SERVICE_ZAMBIA'
